dct_title_s: ATLANTIS NEPOS FACIT GEMINO COMMERCIA MUNDO
dct_description_sm: Winged central figure points to two small maps: ANTIENT WORLD (upper left) and PRESENT WORLD (lower right), which includes California as an island on one of 2 hemispheres.
The figure of Atlas carrying a globe in background.
Very similar to Brietâ€™s title page (TP- ).
